channel.title: Auto Save When Exit Help
channel.description:
I belive this code was on rs-server but I got a new source and dont have access to it , and so if i wana reboot server I have to log in and kick everyone off and stuff and if i dont it just goes to the last 30 seconds they were at.... and sometimes cause of this when they log on after it just being shut off some people screen gets stuck on loading please wait...
so any one with this tut mind posting it? I cant seem to find it on mopar

item.title: Auto Save When Exit Help
item.dc:creator: @Wolfeyes217 Wolfeyes217
item.description:
@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

-.- you think im dumb , I need it for server crashes if I dont and it shuts down without saving peoples profiles will get messed up

Read full topic
